entry.title: $1895 // Oversized Studio / Convertable 1Bdrm residence in prime UES!
entry.content:
Oversized Studio / Convertable 1Bdrm residence in recently renovated pre-war building in prime UES!

This massive studio features exposed brick walls and hardwood floors. Located in a recently renovated pre-war building.

The apartment has great ceiling height, allowing an abundance of natural light to flow throughout this oversized studio apartment. Some features include ample cabinet space, an abundance of closet space, and more.

Expierience all the UES has to offer with the best restaurants, shopping, nightlife, and more) Call or email today to schedule a private showing

Amenities:

Hardwood Floors
High Ceiling


**Transportation nearby via the Q / 4/ 5 / 6 Trains
